title: What process should the Government use to set a new emissions reduction target in legislation?

answers.option: The Government sets a 2050 target in legislation now
answers.textbox: NZ (businesses, iwi, communities and households) needs certainty to act fast now.  more…

answers.option: If the Government sets a 2050 target now, which is the best target for New Zealand?
answers.textbox: Net zero emissions across all greenhouse gases by 2050.

title: How should New Zealand meet its targets?

answers.option: Domestic emissions reductions only (including from new forest planting).
answers.textbox: NZ (businesses, iwi, communities and households) needs certainty to act fast now. International emissions units will be volatile in price - and relying on these undermines decisive domestic investment here in NZ.   more…

answers.option: If the Government sets a 2050 target now, which is the best target for New Zealand?
answers.textbox: Net zero emissions across all greenhouse gases by 2050.

answers.option: If the Government sets a 2050 target now, which is the best target for New Zealand?
answers.textbox: Net zero emissions across all greenhouse gases by 2050.

answers.textbox: Net zero emissions across all greenhouse gases by 2050.
